Summary: Irregular formation of faint star-like objects; high-altitude/rate of speed
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Santa Clara
There were no other sightings in Santa Clara on or around August 18th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my porch -- I've been watching evening ISS passings all month...I just happened to look up, and I saw approximately a dozen, very faint, but visible nonetheless, star-like objects -- all exactly identical in size, speed and brightness -- moving in a very tight formation, at what appeared to be a very high altitude and a very high rate of speed. They travelled from north to south. I observed for at least 6 seconds, maybe 7, before they faded-out (the same way satellites do). No power plant noise. No red or green lights. Racing faster than I had ever seen any other satellite. Very bizarre. Formation was irregularly shaped: Shaped like a triangle, but with more "stars" on the right side of the formation, with several trailing. No streaks, sparks, or other detritus. I called all major (and minor) news stations in the area, along with police and sheriff's departments (I even woke up a public affairs guy from NORAD in Colorado -- I somehow got the guy's home number -- he was in bed when I called him) -- but nobody had heard of any UFO reports. I am prior military (intelligence) and I know my aircraft IDs. Never seen anything like this. Absolutely amazing. Even if I had had a video camera, the formation (like a shotgun pattern) was too faint and too fast to have been able to pick up. Whatever it was, NORAD MUST HAVE PICKED IT UP (somebody out there knows what it was)...
